title: Everything that Rises Must Converge Rome allusion

content.question: The allusion in the final sentence of the passage (“Rome . . . a day”) primarily serves to

choices.label: provide an example of Julian’s mother’s indulgence in her son’s plans
demonstrate Julian’s mother’s anxiety about her son’s future
contrast Julian’s despair about finding financial success
establish a similarity between Rome and the immediate neighborhood

content.answer: contrast Julian’s despair about finding financial success

skill.text: Skill 6.D: Identify and explain the function of an allusion.
